articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: Virat-Rohit or Rohit-Yashasvi? - Matthew Hayden has a suggestion for India openers at T20 World Cup - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Cricketing legends Sourav Ganguly and Matthew Hayden, former Australia opener, have weighed in on Virat Kohli's batting position for the upcoming T20
